Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Lowe
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Halsted,76th, Vincennes, and 79th due to fire department activity near 79th/Lowe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Sheridan. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Sheridan.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
